title: Inquiry-Based Deep Mathematical Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics curriculum understanding and general pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to deeply explore math concepts using digital tools and develop classroom-applicable pedagogical methods

learning_goals: Design and implement three inquiry questions analyzing the interconnections between mathematical concepts
Develop two or more mathematical problem-solving models using pattern recognition and concept mapping techniques
Create a mathematics lesson design incorporating metacognition and refine it through peer feedback
Submit a project outcome simulating real classroom scenarios using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
